assetProfile.address2: Bull Temple Road N. R. Colony
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Sonata Software Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology services and solutions in India, the United States, Europe, Australia, and the Middle East. It also offers software development, technical, and product marketing services, as well as consulting services. In addition, the company delivers solutions for customers in travel, retail, manufacturing, distribution, transportation, and services and software industries through IP-led platform solutions, such as Rezopia, Brick & Click Retail, Kartopia, Modern Distribution, Halosys, commodity trading and risk management (CTRM), and KODO. Further, it resells product licenses of software companies. Sonata Software Limited has alliances with SAP and Microsoft. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Bengaluru, India.
